title: Bachelor of Business Administration in Professional Sales
description: A degree in Professional Sales from the Coles College of Business will prepare you with the tools, skills, and support you need for success. Unique resources like our state-of-the-art Sales Lab and Center for Professional Selling offer experiential learning opportunities that help you make an impact immediately after graduation. Employers will be looking for you in this hot field! You will take courses in professional selling, sales management, business-to-business marketing, consumer behavior, entrepreneurship, and more.
careers: Sales Manager, Business Development Manager, Sales Agent
